SA17nagcitpu:3: varadāṃ ca mayā natvā kriyate jayamaṃgalam // NCit_1.1 //
SA17nagcitpu:5: pārvatyā anusṛtyaiva jāyatāṃ kila paṇḍitāḥ // NCit_1.2 //
SA17nagcitpu:9: namo namo mayā samyag ucyate citralakṣaṇam // NCit_1.3 //
SA17nagcitpu:10: ādau candramasaṃ vande haraṃ ca candraśekharaṃ /
SA17nagcitpu:11: viṣṇvindrau sūryamagniṃ ca varuṇaṃ marutaṃ tathā // NCit_1.4 //
SA17nagcitpu:13: nagnajitaṃ namaskṛtya tvācāryāṃśca punaḥ punaḥ // NCit_1.5 //
SA17nagcitpu:19: ucyate citralakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇvantu tadvidā janāḥ // NCit_1.8 //
SA17nagcitpu:26: akālamṛtyuhīnāstāḥ kutaḥ krodhāḥ kuto malāḥ // NCit_1.11 //
SA17nagcitpu:29: varṇāśramā hi catvāro na cyutā dharmatatparāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:32: bhayajito manaḥ śuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tapasi drutam // NCit_1.14 //
SA17nagcitpu:42: kathaṃ rodiṣi bho vipra cetyapṛcchad dvijaṃ nṛpaḥ // NCit_1.19 //
SA17nagcitpu:45: tato 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ taṃ śāssīdaṃ nṛpa niścitam /
SA17nagcitpu:46: viṣmayo ya itaḥ pūrvaṃ na jāto 'sau pravartate // NCit_1.21 //
SA17nagcitpu:49: bramha priyau hi rājan tvaṃ sarva jānāsi bhūtale /
SA17nagcitpu:50: prāṇatulyaṃ sutaṃ mahyaṃ dehi svāmin kṛpānvitaḥ // NCit_1.23 //
SA17nagcitpu:51: dayāṃ yadi na kuryāstvaṃ śaktiman guṇavan nṛpa /
SA17nagcitpu:54: ākarṣaṇe sutaṃ tasya matiṃ cakre nṛpālakaḥ // NCit_1.25 //
SA17nagcitpu:56: sūryavarcodharaṃ yamam uditaṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān // NCit_1.26 //
SA17nagcitpu:60: cākāle 'pahṛto yo 'sau tava dūtena durdhiyā // NCit_1.28 //
SA17nagcitpu:62: viśvakarman dvijanmane asmai prītyā ca dhīmate // NCit_1.29 //
SA17nagcitpu:63: śrutvā pretādhipo vākyaṃ pūjanīyaṃ hasan nṛpam /
SA17nagcitpu:64: dadau pratyuttaraṃ mṛdu tejasā pūritaṃ vacaḥ // NCit_1.30 //
SA17nagcitpu:66: kasyāpyākarṣaṇe tyāge svecchāśaktiḥ kuto mama // NCit_1.31 //
SA17nagcitpu:67: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ karmavaśaṃ sadā /
SA17nagcitpu:68: tasmāt rājan vijānīyān mayā naiva pragṛhyate // NCit_1.32 //
SA17nagcitpu:72: karmānusāriṇī bhūmir vijñeyā ca sadā nṛṇām // NCit_1.34 //
SA17nagcitpu:75: na śakyate na śakyate yama āha punaḥ punaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:76: dehi dehi sutaṃ deva rājñāpi prārthitaḥ punaḥ // NCit_1.36 //
SA17nagcitpu:78: vyākulau tī mahāyuddhe tadā liptau babhūvatuḥ // NCit_1.37 //
SA17nagcitpu:79: tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti ta rājā bahuśaḥ prāha vīrahā /
SA17nagcitpu:80: sthito 'smīti raṇe rājan tamavocad nṛpaṃ yamaḥ // NCit_1.38 //
SA17nagcitpu:82: akarod bhayajid rājā yamasyopari sarvataḥ // NCit_1.39 //
SA17nagcitpu:84: apratirodharupaṃ tad astraṃ vavarṣa dharmarāṭ // NCit_1.40 //
SA17nagcitpu:88: bhūpena sarvathā naṣṭā bhayapravartakā ime // NCit_1.42 //
SA17nagcitpu:91: tataḥ pretādhipo devo dṛṣṭvā taṃ tu parājitam /
SA17nagcitpu:96: babhūvurāturā sarve tena durlakṣaṇena vai // NCit_1.46 //
SA17nagcitpu:97: duḥkhitāṃ sakalāṃ pṛthvīṃ dṛsṭvā brahmā tathā suraiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:98: ājagāma svayaṃ tatra tasmin deśe raṇākule // NCit_1.47 //
SA17nagcitpu:100: sāñjaliḥ pūjayitvā taṃ prāha yathāyathaṃ vacaḥ // NCit_1.48 //
SA17nagcitpu:103: pratyāvṛtya raṇād devaḥ kathayāmāsa tau tadā // NCit_1.49 //
SA17nagcitpu:105: satyanarādhipasyaiva kālasya na tu karmaṇaḥ // NCit_1.50 //
SA17nagcitpu:106: purā śubhāśubhaṃ karma tathā ca śiśunā kṛtam /
SA17nagcitpu:107: labdhañca maraṇaṃ śīghra janma prāpya ca mānuṣam // NCit_1.51 //
SA17nagcitpu:111: rupamālikha bho rājan sarvalokahitāya vaṃ // NCit_1.53 //
SA17nagcitpu:120: yamadutā jitāḥ śaktyā sādhu sādhu kṛtaṃ tvayā // NCit_1.57 //
SA17nagcitpu:121: brahmāṇā kathite tvevaṃ sa rājā harṣamāptavām /
SA17nagcitpu:122: sarvadamanakārī tu daurmanasyaṃ yamo gataḥ // NCit_1.58 //
SA17nagcitpu:124: brahmā svayaṃ samāśvāsya bhūpatiṃ prāha sattamaḥ // NCit_1.59 //
SA17nagcitpu:125: dharmanītiḥ suvijñāya na nindet kāmapi prajām /
SA17nagcitpu:127: yatra sevā satāṃ nāsti tatra nindā bhaved dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:128: nālpamapi sukhaṃ kiñcid āpnoti nindukaḥ sadā // NCit_1.61 //
SA17nagcitpu:132: jātyā balena dānena naipuṇyena ca vidyayā // NCit_1.63 //
SA17nagcitpu:134: prakartavyo na kartavyo nindopāyaḥ kathañcana // NCit_1.64 //
SA17nagcitpu:136: kṣamāvalambanīyā syāt nindā tyājyā tathaiva ca /
SA17nagcitpu:137: sarvajño nirahaṃkaro guṇine na dviṣennṛpaḥ // NCit_1.65 //
SA17nagcitpu:138: puruṣaṃ vacanaṃ tyājyam āghātaṃ visṛjet sadā /
SA17nagcitpu:139: pratyakṣaṃ prāpyate yattu sārthakyaṃ tasya cintayet // NCit_1.66 //
SA17nagcitpu:141: vidhiyaṃ naiva kāryaṃ hi yamasyāpi tato nṛpa // NCit_1.67 //
SA17nagcitpu:142: brahmaṇetthaṃ sa bhūpālo hy upadiṣṭo dvijapriyaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:143: namaskṛtya yamasvārthe kṛtavān supriyaṃ tathā // NCit_1.68 //
SA17nagcitpu:146: atha brahmā nṛpaṃ prāha nagnaṃ pretaṃ nivāraya /
SA17nagcitpu:147: yamadāsaiḥ sadā viśvaṃ na pātayed bhavān khalu // NCit_1.70 //
SA17nagcitpu:148: balena tejasā cāpi tapasemaṃ guṇaṃ nṛpāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:150: bhavān mahāyaśasvī ca karaṇīyo mayā kṣitau /
SA17nagcitpu:151: nivartasva kumārgebhyas tvaṃ sadā pṛthivīpate // NCit_1.72 //
SA17nagcitpu:154: prajāpatitulaḥ pṛthvāṃ yaśasvī tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // NCit_1.74 //
SA17nagcitpu:156: prajāḥ pālaya niṣpāpaḥ anumatistathā mama // NCit_1.75 //
SA17nagcitpu:160: adya prabhṛti taccitra jagadvandyaṃ bhavet sadā // NCit_1.77 //
SA17nagcitpu:164: citramiti prasiddhaṃ tat sarvatraiva bhaviṣyati // NCit_1.79 //
SA17nagcitpu:166: sarve nemuśca bhaktyā taṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokapālakam // NCit_1.80 //
SA17nagcitpu:168: sarvadevagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ jagāma svagṛhaṃ mudā // NCit_1.81 //
SA17nagcitpu:170: svasthānamāgato dhīmān prīṇayitvā yamaṃ tathā // NCit_1.82 //
SA17nagcitpu:172: yasmād deśāt samāpannas tatraiva praviveśa ca // NCit_1.83 //
SA17nagcitpu:174: udyato 'bhūt sadaivāsau saputre prasthite dvije // NCit_1.84 //
SA17nagcitpu:175: sarvarūpānukūlaṃ tat mānaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:176: tat praṣṭuṃ sṛṣṭikattariṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma saḥ // NCit_1.85 //
SA17nagcitpu:178: citrasya lakṣaṇāni me nānāvidhāni santi ca // NCit_1.86 //
SA17nagcitpu:179: parimāṇaṃ kimasya syāt vidhinā kīdṛśena vā /
SA17nagcitpu:181: brahmātha prāha bhūpendraṃ śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:182: atiguhyaṃ mahad vākyaṃ paramaṃ kathayāmi te // NCit_1.88 //
SA17nagcitpu:184: tataḥ prajā mayā sṛṣṭā upadiṣṭāśca tā mayā // NCit_1.89 //
SA17nagcitpu:186: vedāccitraṃ prajātaṃ vai tasmād jñeyaṃ tathaiva tat // NCit_1.90 //
SA17nagcitpu:191: yathā nareṣu bhūpendras tathā citraṃ kalāsu vai // NCit_1.92 //
SA17nagcitpu:194: tathaiva citrakarmaṇi kalāḥ sarvāḥ samāśritāḥ // NCit_1.93 //
SA17nagcitpu:195: himālayo yathā śreṣṭho nageṣu sakaleṣu ca /
SA17nagcitpu:196: gaṅgā nadiṣu śreṣṭhaiva graheṣu somabhāskarau // NCit_1.94 //
SA17nagcitpu:198: tathā śreṣṭhaṃ bhaveccitraṃ sarvāsu hi kalāsu ca // NCit_1.95 //
SA17nagcitpu:199: nagnajid gaccha tasmāt tvaṃ viśvakarma samīpataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:200: lakṣaṇavidhimānaṃ ca tubhyaṃ sa upadekṣyati // NCit_1.96 //
SA17nagcitpu:202: viśvakarmasamīpe tu prasanno hyagamad drutam // NCit_1.97 //
SA17nagcitpu:204: ātithyaṃ vidhivat kṛtvā rājñe so 'dadadāsanam // NCit_1.98 //
SA17nagcitpu:206: citrasya lakṣaṇaṃ karma upadiśatu me prabho // NCit_1.99 //
SA17nagcitpu:207: vidhirvā parimāṇaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ vā bhavettathā /
SA17nagcitpu:210: citraśilpasya śāstraṃ tu tasmai rājñe hyupādiśat // NCit_1.101 //
SA17nagcitpu:214: nirdiṣṭaṃ citralakṣaṇaṃ buddhimantaḥ kṛte śṛṇu // NCit_1.103 //
SA17nagcitpu:218: brahmaṇaḥ kṛpayā labdhāḥ sarve śilpā mayā kṛtāḥ // NCit_1.105 //
SA17nagcitpu:228: likhitvā vividhaṃ samyak tubhyaṃ mayā pradaśryate // NCit_1.109 //
SA17nagcitpu:229: // iti nagnajiccitralakṣaṇanirdeśe nagnajayo nāma prathamaḥ parivarttaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:231: yathoktaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvam ācaṣṭe bhūpatiṃ tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:233: sthāvare jaṃgame naṣṭe pralayānte ca vai purā /
SA17nagcitpu:234: prādurabhūt suvarṇāṇḍaṃ tamo hatvā jalāt kila // NCit_2.2 //
SA17nagcitpu:238: āyuṣā sahitasyaiva brahmaṇo jātireva ca // NCit_2.4 //
SA17nagcitpu:239: sthānaṃ caryā ca dharmaśca nyāyaśca prābhavan tadā /
SA17nagcitpu:240: evaṃ kṛte sati brahmā-cintayat jagato hitam // NCit_2.5 //
SA17nagcitpu:243: apramādena cādaraḥ sadā teṣu kathaṃ bhavet // NCit_2.6 //
SA17nagcitpu:244: brahmetthaṃ cintayitvā tu viṣṇoḥ śivasya cātmanaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:245: śakrasya sarvadevānāṃ parimāṇaṃ guṇaṃ tathā // NCit_2.7 //
SA17nagcitpu:247: manoramaṃ surupaṃ ca atyantasradṛśaṃ tathā // NCit_2.8 //
SA17nagcitpu:249: miśritena ca varṇena citrākāraṃ vinirmame // NCit_2.9 //
SA17nagcitpu:251: sādhu sādhviti saṃpūjya praśaṃśasurvidhiṃ surāḥ // NCit_2.10 //
SA17nagcitpu:252: ime devāḥ prasannāśca svaptākāraṃ ca lebhire /
SA17nagcitpu:253: adhiṣṭhānaṃ prabhāvaṃ ca kṛtavantastathā ime // NCit_2.11 //
SA17nagcitpu:254: prāha saptasurān brahmā astu puṇyaṃ samāśritam /
SA17nagcitpu:255: adya prabhṛti sarvatra yuṣmākaṃ pratimāsu ca /
SA17nagcitpu:256: nātra śaṅkā kṛthā naraḥ pūjayiṣyati vaḥ sadā // NCit_2.12 //
SA17nagcitpu:258: manuṣyeṣu ca yo nāma bhavantaṃ pūjayiṣyati /
SA17nagcitpu:259: tasmai kāmasya siddhaye nairujyaṃ saṃpradāsyati // NCit_2.13 //
SA17nagcitpu:261: sarveṣā rakṣaṇa kṛtvā pāpān nāśayati dhruvam // NCit_2.14 //
SA17nagcitpu:267: tayaiva dīyate śāntis tasmai bhaktāya sarvataḥ // NCit_2.17 //
SA17nagcitpu:271: parimāṇādikaṃ teṣāṃ mattaḥ śrutvā ca lakṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:273: brahmaṇaśca mayā prāptaṃ vidyottamā ca lakṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:274: aśeṣaṃ parimāṇaṃ ca tubhyamadya pradīyate // NCit_2.20 //
SA17nagcitpu:275: trilokeṣu ca pūjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:282: tat tathaiva pravakṣyāmi mānaṃ brūhi prajāsu ca // NCit_3.1 //
SA17nagcitpu:285: ye bhavanti ca teṣāṃ vai bhūpatonāṃ tatastathā /
SA17nagcitpu:291: aṣṭalikṣā bhaved yūkaḥ aṣṭayūkā yavaḥ smṛtaḥ // NCit_3.5 //
SA17nagcitpu:302: sākṣāt savarṇyate cātra purvoktaṃ vistareṇa ca // NCit_3.10 //
SA17nagcitpu:304: tribhāgena vibhaktaṃ ca samānena tathā budhaiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:312: dvātriṃśat tasya maṇdalam aṅgulīnāṃ hi mānataḥ // NCit_3.14 //
SA17nagcitpu:315: karṇārandhrasya cāroha ekāṅgulo bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.15 //
SA17nagcitpu:319: bhruvorucchrāya āroho dvau yavau caturaṃguliḥ // NCit_3.17 //
SA17nagcitpu:321: narttane rodane krodhe cāpākārā bhavet sadā // NCit_3.18 //
SA17nagcitpu:322: bhaye śoke ca bhrūprāntāv unnatau kramikau smṛtau /
SA17nagcitpu:325: bhrūmadhyāt keśaparyantaṃ mānaṃ dvyardhāṅgulaṃ matam // NCit_3.20 //
SA17nagcitpu:327: dvyaṅgulau hyakṣikoṣaḥ syān netramadhyaṃ tathaiva tu // NCit_3.21 //
SA17nagcitpu:331: yad bhavettasya mānaṃ syād yavatrayapramāṇakam // NCit_3.23 //
SA17nagcitpu:338: kāmināṃ ca tathā strīṇāṃ netraṃ matsyodaraṃ bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:343: dīrghāgrasundaraṃ pakṣma śuvarṇaṃ saralaṃ mṛdu // NCit_3.29 //
SA17nagcitpu:345: rājannetat vijānīyād yathā syāt netralakṣaṇam // NCit_3.30 //
SA17nagcitpu:348: vilikhayet tathā dhīmān citraśāstreṣu dīkṣitaḥ // NCit_3.31 //
SA17nagcitpu:357: ārohaḥ ṣaḍyavastasya oṣṭha ekāṅguliḥ smṛtaḥ // NCit_3.35 //
SA17nagcitpu:369: pañcāṅgulaṃ tu gaṇḍodhvaṃ adhaḥ syāt caturaṅgulam /
SA17nagcitpu:370: civukasya tathā mānaṃ caturaṅgulakaṃ matam // NCit_3.41 //
SA17nagcitpu:372: caturasraṃ mukhaṃ pūrṇaṃ prasannaṃ cārulakṣaṇam // NCit_3.42 //
SA17nagcitpu:373: trikoṇā kuṭilā vṛttā naiva kāryā mukhākṛtiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:374: krodhayuk roṣayuk caiva na mukhaṃ syāt kadācana // NCit_3.43 //
SA17nagcitpu:376: susampanno bhaviṣyati nara iha ca sarvadā // NCit_3.44 //
SA17nagcitpu:377: śāntikāmi mukhaṃ yat syād dīrghaṃ khartaṃ ca vartulam /
SA17nagcitpu:378: trikoṇaṃ vā prajānāñca sāmānyānāṃ bhaviṣyati // NCit_3.45 //
SA17nagcitpu:380: tad vijñeyaṃ ca devānāṃ mukhasya mānamīdṛśam // NCit_3.46 //
SA17nagcitpu:382: avikṣiptena gṛhyatāṃ manasā ca mahipate // NCit_3.47 //
SA17nagcitpu:384: jñeyaṃ tad dvyaṅgulaṃ nūnaṃ skandhāyāmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:385: daighrye tvaṣṭāṅgulo jñeyo vakṣastu dviguṇaṃ smṛtam // NCit_3.48 //
SA17nagcitpu:387: aṣṭādaśāṅgulā śroṇī ārohe kathitā budhaiḥ // NCit_3.49 //
SA17nagcitpu:388: jatruto hṛdayaṃ yāvan na kuṭilaḥ pradeśakaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:390: nābhito meṭraparyantaṃ samānaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.50 //
SA17nagcitpu:392: mānaṃ ca dahiṇāvarttaṃ yavaikaṃ cucukaṃ smṛtam // NCit_3.51 //
SA17nagcitpu:405: tathaiva madhyadeśī hi āroheṇa ṣaḍaṅguliḥ // NCit_3.56 //
SA17nagcitpu:410: mṛdu karikarākāraṃ na kāryaṃ viṣamaṃ kvacit // NCit_3.58 //
SA17nagcitpu:412: jaṅghāyāḥ paścimo bhāgaḥ suvṛtto 'lponnatau bhavet // NCit_3.59 //
SA17nagcitpu:413: ucchrāyeṇa tu pārṣṇīnāṃ mānaṃ pañcāṅgulaṃ matam /
SA17nagcitpu:418: pādasya bandhanaṃ syāttu dvyuṅgulaṃ bhūpadeśagam // NCit_3.62 //
SA17nagcitpu:427: aṅguṣṭhāpekṣayā sthūlā ārohe tryaṅgulā matāḥ // NCit_3.66 //
SA17nagcitpu:435: avraṇā mṛdavaḥ pūrṇāḥ yavamānena pūritāḥ // NCit_3.70 //
SA17nagcitpu:440: itthaṃ caraṇamānaṃ syān mayā proktaṃ sucintitam // NCit_3.72 //
SA17nagcitpu:442: talaṃ saptāṅgulaṃ dīrghaṃ vistāraḥ pañcakāṅguliḥ // NCit_3.73 //
SA17nagcitpu:444: tarjanyā nyūnatā bodhyā parvārdhena susaṃmatā // NCit_3.74 //
SA17nagcitpu:448: aṅguṣṭhe dve tu parvaṇī samenaika yavo bhavet // NCit_3.76 //
SA17nagcitpu:451: āyāmo 'ṣṭayavaḥ kārya ārohastu yavā nava // NCit_3.77 //
SA17nagcitpu:458: parvārdhena mitāḥ kāryā nakhāḥ sūkṣmāṃ nakhāgrakāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:459: sṛṣyante ca yavādṛśaḥ parvatarekhā tvadoṣabhāk // NCit_3.81 //
SA17nagcitpu:460: parvaṃ dīrghaṃ ca vṛtaṃ ca karatalasuśobhanam /
SA17nagcitpu:461: talau padmasamau raktau karasyaivaṃ vidhānataḥ // NCit_3.82 //
SA17nagcitpu:463: rekhātrayaṃ kare proktaṃ raktavarṇaṃ suśobhanam // NCit_3.83 //
SA17nagcitpu:466: sukhadaṃ cāru susparśaṃ kuryāt karatalaṃ śubham // NCit_3.84 //
SA17nagcitpu:467: samantān māṃsapūrṇaṃ vai nāṛī dṛśyā kadāpi na /
SA17nagcitpu:468: hastapṛṣṭhaṃ sadā snigdham unnataṃ ca bhaved dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:469: sūkṣmā aṅgulijālā hi sundaraṃ ca tanustathā // NCit_3.85 //
SA17nagcitpu:473: bāhūnāṃ mānamārohaṃ dhīman śṛṇu vadāni te // NCit_3.87 //
SA17nagcitpu:474: ubhayostu tathā bāhvīr mānaṃ kuryād yathāvidhi /
SA17nagcitpu:476: aṣṭādaśa prabāhośca bāhoścāpi tathaiva ca // NCit_3.88 //
SA17nagcitpu:478: āyāmo bāhubhāgasya jñeyaṃ pañcāṅgulaṃ sadā // NCit_3.89 //
SA17nagcitpu:480: viśālo varttulākāraḥ suspaṣṭoraṃśo bhavet punaḥ // NCit_3.90 //
SA17nagcitpu:483: hastau na jānuparyantau dīrdhau sūkṣrmau ca sundarau /
SA17nagcitpu:490: yāni purvaṃ na coktāni tāni tubhyaṃ vadāmyaham // NCit_3.95 //
SA17nagcitpu:495: āyāme cāṅgulīnāṃ hī saṃkhyā yāyād navānvitā // NCit_3.97 //
SA17nagcitpu:497: pṛṣṭhamadhyaḥ ṣaḍaṅgulir urdhve tu viṃśatirmatā // NCit_3.98 //
SA17nagcitpu:499: puruṣāṇāmidaṃ mānaṃ strīṇāṃ bhāgaḥ sa eva hi /
SA17nagcitpu:504: caturaṅgulaṃ sthānaṃ syāt pāyustu dvyuṅgulaṃ matam // NCit_3.101 //
SA17nagcitpu:512: varṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ caiva devamukhe na dīyate // NCit_3.104 //
SA17nagcitpu:514: dadhimuktābjavacchuklāḥ svacchāḥ śvetā himā iva // NCit_3.105 //
SA17nagcitpu:516: ārohe triyavā jñeyā āyāme yavayugmakāḥ // NCit_3.106 //
SA17nagcitpu:517: dantamūlaṃ tathā tālu jihvāsīmā ca lohitam /
SA17nagcitpu:523: navārdhaparṇavaccāruḥ mukhe vai vitato bhavet // NCit_3.109 //
SA17nagcitpu:525: megharavasya gambhīrā vāṇī proktā sulakṣaṇā // NCit_3.110 //
SA17nagcitpu:533: jaṅghāsu kaṇṭhagaṇḍeṣu keśā na syurmahātmanām // NCit_3.114 //
SA17nagcitpu:536: vakṣasthalaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca śobhitaṃ syāt sulakṣaṇam // NCit_3.115 //
SA17nagcitpu:537: devabhūtamanuṣyāṇāṃ mukhe śmaśru na roma ca // NCit_3.116 //
SA17nagcitpu:545: uttamaḥ puruṣo jñeyaḥ lakṣmaṇaṃ cakravarttinaḥ // NCit_3.120 //
SA17nagcitpu:550: veśadṛśāṃ gatiṃ cātha atikramya ca sarveṣām /
SA17nagcitpu:552: gatirasya bhavedrājan sarveṣāṃ ca manoramā // NCit_3.123 //
SA17nagcitpu:556: samantāt kiraṇāvṛtaḥ rājā lekhyaḥ kṛśaḥ sadā // NCit_3.125 //
SA17nagcitpu:558: śarīraṃ yasya rājendra lakṣaṇaṃ cakravarttinaḥ // NCit_3.126 //
SA17nagcitpu:561: bhrūvoḥ kaṇṭhasya bhālasya saundaryaṃ hi mukhasya ca // NCit_3.127 //
SA17nagcitpu:563: cārvoṣṭaṃ raktimāpūrṇaṃ svacchā dantā nabho yathā // NCit_3.128 //
SA17nagcitpu:564: dīrdhottama ca pakṣma hi snigdhavarṇaṃ bhavettathā /
SA17nagcitpu:565: nīlaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca dīrghaṃ ca cakṣuḥ syāt sumanoharam /
SA17nagcitpu:566: bhrūvau dīptau sadā jñeyau netrānandavidhāyakau // NCit_3.129 //
SA17nagcitpu:574: dakṣiṇāvartino nābhiḥ gabhīrā syād yathāyatham // NCit_3.133 //
SA17nagcitpu:576: samantāt maṇḍalākāraḥ ābhādṛśyā bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.134 //
SA17nagcitpu:578: mukheṣu connatā jñeyā gulpho 'dṛśpo bhavet tathā // NCit_3.135 //
SA17nagcitpu:581: pādapṛṣṭomṛdū syātāṃ komalau haritau smṛtau // NCit_3.136 //
SA17nagcitpu:587: tejasvī vīryavān rājan cakravarttī sadā bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:589: dehe jaṅghopajaṅghā ca bhṛśaṃ vikaśitā bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:590: suhastau caraṇau syātāṃ tathā parva ca dṛśyate // NCit_3.140 //
SA17nagcitpu:592: śobhitau ca bhujau syātāṃ deho mānānvito bhavet // NCit_3.141 //
SA17nagcitpu:595: cārudeho mahīpateḥ cakravartī sa ucyate // NCit_3.142 //
SA17nagcitpu:598: upayukteṣu sarveṣu parimāṇaṃ tu yatra ca /
SA17nagcitpu:599: tatra svāṅgulinā kāryaṃ mānaṃ sarvatra karmaṇi // NCit_3.144 //
SA17nagcitpu:601: vidhinā parimāṇena sammpannaṃ śobhitaṃ bhavet // NCit_3.145 //
SA17nagcitpu:604: pratimā sā parityaktā suradevaiḥ sadā khalu // NCit_3.146 //
SA17nagcitpu:605: piśācā rākṣasā bhūtā vasanti tvarita tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:606: śobhitān nāśayanti ca amaṅgalaṃ bhayaṃ bhavet // NCit_3.147 //
SA17nagcitpu:608: yathecchaṃ vai vibhaktavyaṃ caturbhāgena mukhyataḥ // NCit_3.148 //
SA17nagcitpu:613: apriyo na yathā yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vicārayet /
SA17nagcitpu:614: kiṃ bhavet parimāṇena śarīraṃ cedasundaram // NCit_3.151 //
SA17nagcitpu:615: caturṇāṃ ca tathā rājñāṃ parimāṇasya lakṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:616: brahmaṇā tu pradarśitaṃ vistaraṃ bravīmi te // NCit_3.152 //
SA17nagcitpu:617: sarvasya lekhane granthe vistāro bhavati dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:618: tena trasyanti cālpajñā aśrutikāraṇān nanu // NCit_3.153 //
SA17nagcitpu:622: tubhyaṃ pradarśayāmi ced gacched grantho viśālatām // NCit_3.155 //
SA17nagcitpu:625: uttamapuruṣādīnāṃ tena mānaṃ dhruvaṃ bhavet // NCit_3.156 //
SA17nagcitpu:626: ato buddhayā suniścitya bhadro lekhyo vicārayan /
SA17nagcitpu:627: sa ca bhavet samucchrāye ṣaḍuttaraśatāṅgulam // NCit_3.157 //
SA17nagcitpu:635: ucchrāyo navarat strīṇā jñeya ekāṅguliḥ kṛśaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:639: āroho nāpriyo yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vidhīyatām // NCit_3.162 //
SA17nagcitpu:642: nārīṇāṃ parimāṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ śṛṇu krameṇa hi // NCit_3.163 //
SA17nagcitpu:643: rājñāṃ yathā pradarśitaṃ mānena ca tathāyutam /
